group_1.textRight: (It's possible she was just being vague,@but...)
There's something strange about that story.

group_1.textLeft: I get the feeling it wouldn't be wise to let@her see Mel.

group_1.textRight: I'll go talk to her. There's something@suspicious about this, anyway.

group_1.textLeft: You're quite the popular one today.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but I'm really not happy about it...

group_1.textLeft: So you were attacked by a Magical Girl who@looked like Mel.
And she claimed to be "a Magical Girl from@that ward you hate," right?

group_1.textRight: Yes! I knew it, that girl WAS a spy for the@east this whole time!

group_1.textCenter: However, the girl who was attacked said...
It was someone who looked exactly like you,@and they said, "I am your enemy."

group_1.textLeft: ("A Magical Girl from that ward you hate"...@I see what's going on here.)
(I thought Tsuruno was just trying to cheer@me up by joking around...)
(But I think she really might've worked@it out.)
No, not at all. Thank you so much for the@useful information.
Now I know who's behind all of this...
The ones who are deliberately trying to pit@the east and the west against each other.
We can finally take action.
Oh! I was just talking to myself... This@should still stay a secret.
Let's keep this between us, okay?
Now, I really have to get going.

group_1.textCenter: Someone's trying to pit us against each@other?
I know she said to keep it secret, but I@have to at least let my team know.
There's no stopping a good piece of gossip.@Or so they say, anyway.
I hope it spreads fast enough... Just enough@to stop some of the fighting would be fine.
Anyway, I have to track down evidence with@Yachan and the others now...

group_1.textLeft: It was exactly as you thought, Mifuyu.@Great work.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You flatter me. Remember, Tsuruno@deserves credit too.

group_1.textLeft: Let's get in touch with Kanagi. I think we@have a strong enough case for negotiations.

group_1.textRight: Yes, we should do so as soon as possible.
Talking to her tomorrow would be ideal.@That way we can deal with everything then.

group_1.textLeft: I agree. We still have things that need to@be investigated, after all.

group_1.textRight: All the attacks so far were carried out@"inside a Labyrinth"...
And all the attackers were supposedly@"Magical Girls from an opposing ward".
How about us? What should we do?

group_1.textLeft: You, Tsuruno, and Mel will be waiting on@alert.
It's very likely we may need you to drop@everything and rush to our aid tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Gotcha! We'll be waitin' for the signal.

group_1.textLeft: Just leave everything to the Mightiest@Magical Girl, Tsuruno Yui!

group_1.textRight: I'll make them regret dragging my name@through the mud!

group_1.textLeft: And Mifuyu, I'd like you to come with me.

group_1.textRight: Got it. Let's settle this once and for all.
